name: BTS
description: BTS (Î∞©ÌÉÑÏÜåÎÖÑÎã®) is a global K-Pop phenomenon known for their powerful performances, meaningful lyrics, and strong connection with fans worldwide.

funFacts: Called 'Golden Maknae' because he excels at everything
Has a extensive tattoo sleeve on his right arm
Known for his athletic abilities and love for working out
Released solo hit 'Seven' featuring Latto in 2023
His favorite number is 1
members.bio: Jungkook is the youngest member (maknae) of BTS and is often called the 'Golden Maknae' for his exceptional talents in singing, dancing, and athletics. Since debuting at just 15 years old, he has grown into one of the most beloved K-Pop idols worldwide.

funFacts: Studied contemporary dance before joining BTS
First BTS member to have a solo song reach #1 on Billboard Hot 100 with 'Like Crazy'
Known for his eye-smile and cute cheeks
Often gives members surprise back hugs
His solo album 'FACE' topped charts worldwide
members.bio: Jimin is known for his graceful contemporary dance background and powerful vocals. His charismatic stage presence and sweet personality have earned him the nickname 'Mochi' from fans who adore his soft, squishy cheeks and caring nature.

funFacts: Was a 'hidden member' revealed only at BTS's debut
Known for his unique, deep baritone voice
Passionate about art, photography and vintage items
Created the phrase 'I purple you' (Î≥¥ÎùºÌï¥) meaning eternal love
His song 'Christmas Tree' was OST for 'Our Beloved Summer'
members.bio: V, also known as Taehyung, is famous for his unique deep voice and artistic soul. He coined the phrase 'I purple you' which has become a symbol of BTS and ARMY's eternal bond. His eccentric personality and fashion sense have made him a global icon.

funFacts: Went viral as 'Third One From The Left' at 2017 BBMAs
Studied acting at Konkuk University
Famous for his 'dad jokes' and windshield wiper laugh
Completed military service in 2024
Loves cooking and has his own mukbang series 'Eat Jin'
members.bio: Jin is the eldest member of BTS and is known for his stunning visuals, earning him the nickname 'Worldwide Handsome.' His warm personality, hilarious dad jokes, and caring nature as the group's eldest make him the beloved 'mom' of BTS.

funFacts: Learned English by watching 'Friends' TV show
Has an IQ of 148
Known for accidentally breaking things
Passionate about art and visits museums worldwide
Gave historic speech at United Nations
members.bio: RM is the leader of BTS and the group's main rapper. Known for his incredible intelligence (IQ 148) and self-taught English skills, he serves as BTS's spokesperson and has addressed the United Nations multiple times about youth issues.

funFacts: Has solo project 'Agust D' with chart-topping albums
Was an underground rapper before BTS
Known for his savage and honest personality
Produced songs for many artists including IU
Loves basketball and his cat-like personality earned him 'Lil Meow Meow'
members.bio: SUGA is BTS's lead rapper and a prolific producer under his solo alias 'Agust D'. Despite his seemingly cold exterior, he's known for his thoughtful and caring nature. His honest lyrics about mental health have resonated with millions worldwide.

funFacts: Named himself J-Hope to be a source of hope for fans
Was a street dancer before joining BTS
First BTS member to headline a major US festival (Lollapalooza 2022)
Known as the mood maker of the group
His smile is said to be contagious
members.bio: J-Hope is BTS's main dancer and the group's eternal sunshine. He chose his stage name to represent hope for fans. His incredible dance skills, positive energy, and bright personality make him the mood maker of BTS.

seo.title: BTS Name Generator | Create Your Korean Name with ARMY
seo.description: Create your BTS name with all 7 members - Jungkook, Jimin, V, Jin, RM, SUGA & J-Hope! Get instant chemistry scores and Korean stage names. Perfect for ARMY fanfiction.
